meanings.definition: Having a strong, unpleasant smell or taste.
meanings.sent1: The gammiest cheese made my nose wrinkle.
meanings.sent2: The garbage had the gammiest odor imaginable.
meanings.sent3: Even the dog found the gammiest fish unappetizing.
meanings.sent4: The gammiest perfume filled the room with its overpowering scent.
meanings.sent5: The gammiest socks in the laundry basket were unbearable to be near.

meanings.definition: Showing signs of decay or deterioration.
meanings.sent1: The gammiest fruit in the bowl was covered in mold.
meanings.sent2: The old house had the gammiest walls, peeling paint everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The gammiest book on the shelf was falling apart at the seams.
meanings.sent4: The gammiest tree in the forest stood with its rotting trunk.
meanings.sent5: The gammiest car in the junkyard was rusted beyond repair.

meanings.sent1: The gammiest toy in the box was missing pieces.
meanings.sent2: The gammiest clothes in the thrift store were faded and torn.
meanings.sent3: The gammiest sandwich at the picnic fell apart before it was eaten.
meanings.sent4: The gammiest road in town was full of potholes and cracks.
meanings.sent5: The gammiest phone in the store had a cracked screen and slow performance.
